snippet: JUREW--Patricia A. (nee Wolf), 87, died peacefully April 4, 2016. Bloomfield High School, 1947, Katharine Gibbs, 1949. Career: US State Dept., London; NY Times; US Golf Association. Married in 1955 to Wm. Jurew, who predeceased her in 1987. Survived by Lee Ann, Joe, Alex, Callie Puleo; and Peter, Erin, Anna Vincent Jurew. 1/3
lead_paragraph: JUREW--Patricia A. (nee Wolf), 87, died peacefully April 4, 2016. Bloomfield High School, 1947, Katharine Gibbs, 1949. Career: US State Dept., London; NY Times; US Golf Association. Married in 1955 to Wm. Jurew, who predeceased her in 1987. Survived by Lee Ann, Joe, Alex, Callie Puleo; and Peter, Erin, Anna Vincent Jurew. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  JUREW, PATRICIA A
